text:
Here’s a slideshow of #COVID19 victims. These people might have lived if Trump and the White House had a shred of competence. Trump knew about this in Dec. but decided to hold rallies and go to fundraisers. He didn’t care about we the people. #OneVoice1 
https://t.co/Mv3EdSRWWu
